name: codsen-monorepo
description: Monorepo of all our npm libraries
author: Roy Revelt <roy@codsen.com>

scripts.build: FORCE_COLOR=1 lerna run test --bail --concurrency 1 && npm run readme:generate
scripts.fresh: npm run wipe && npm run bootstrap && npm run build
scripts.publish: FORCE_COLOR=1 lerna version --conventional-commits && git add packages/*/changelog.md && npm run readme:generate && git add readme.md && lerna publish from-package --yes && git add . && git commit -m "chore: Automated updating of git head entries" --no-verify && git push

hooks.pre-commit: FORCE_COLOR=1 lerna run test --since --concurrency 2 && git add packages/*/dist/*.*
